text: We will hear arguments next in United States against Clark.
Thank you, Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, this case is here on a writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Claims.

Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, Respondents do in fact focus upon the plain language of the statute, and we contend that there is in fact no ambiguity whatsoever, that in point of fact employees promoted to a higher grade are entitled to the pay implementation provisions of 5334(b), and so the Court of Claims has found.
A couple of points, Mr. Chief Justice.
